# Class SubgraphBuilder

Builder class for creating subgraphs with a fluent API. Subgraphs are reusable graph components that can be referenced by other graphs.

#### Example


```
const subgraph = new SubgraphBuilder('my_subgraph')  .addParameter(&#123; name: 'user_input', type: 'string' &#125;)  .addNode(intentNode)  .addNode(llmNode)  .addEdge(intentNode, llmNode)  .setStartNode(intentNode)  .setEndNode(llmNode)  .build();

```


##### Index

### Constructors

constructor

### Methods

addEdge addNode addParameter addParameters build setEndNode setStartNode

## Constructors

### constructor

  * new SubgraphBuilder(id: string): [SubgraphBuilder]()

Creates a new subgraph builder with the specified ID.

#### Parameters

    * id: string

Unique identifier for the subgraph

#### Returns [SubgraphBuilder]()




## Methods

### addEdge

  * addEdge(  
fromNode: string | [Node](/types/graph_dsl_graph_config_schema.Node) | [AbstractNode](./graph_dsl_nodes_builtin_abstract_node.AbstractNode),  
toNode: string | [Node](/types/graph_dsl_graph_config_schema.Node) | [AbstractNode](./graph_dsl_nodes_builtin_abstract_node.AbstractNode),  
options?: {  
conditionExpression?: string;  
conditionRef?: CustomEdgeConditionReference;  
loop?: boolean;  
optional?: boolean;  
},  
): this

Adds an edge connecting two nodes in the subgraph.

#### Parameters

    * fromNode: string | [Node](/types/graph_dsl_graph_config_schema.Node) | [AbstractNode](./graph_dsl_nodes_builtin_abstract_node.AbstractNode)

Source node or node ID

    * toNode: string | [Node](/types/graph_dsl_graph_config_schema.Node) | [AbstractNode](./graph_dsl_nodes_builtin_abstract_node.AbstractNode)

Destination node or node ID

    * `Optional`options: {  
conditionExpression?: string;  
conditionRef?: CustomEdgeConditionReference;  
loop?: boolean;  
optional?: boolean;  
}

Optional edge configuration

      * ##### `Optional`conditionExpression?: string

CEL expression for conditional execution

      * ##### `Optional`conditionRef?: CustomEdgeConditionReference

Reference to a custom edge condition

      * ##### `Optional`loop?: boolean

Whether the edge creates a loop

      * ##### `Optional`optional?: boolean

Whether the edge is optional

#### Returns this

The builder instance for method chaining




### addNode

  * addNode(node: [Node](/types/graph_dsl_graph_config_schema.Node) | [AbstractNode](./graph_dsl_nodes_builtin_abstract_node.AbstractNode)): this

Adds a node to the subgraph.

#### Parameters

    * node: [Node](/types/graph_dsl_graph_config_schema.Node) | [AbstractNode](./graph_dsl_nodes_builtin_abstract_node.AbstractNode)

Node to add to the subgraph

#### Returns this

The builder instance for method chaining




### addParameter

  * addParameter(  
config: {  
name: string;  
type: "string" | "number" | "boolean" | "integer";  
},  
): this

Adds a parameter to the subgraph that can be passed from the parent graph.

#### Parameters

    * config: { name: string; type: "string" | "number" | "boolean" | "integer" }

Parameter configuration

      * ##### name: string

Parameter name

      * ##### type: "string" | "number" | "boolean" | "integer"

Parameter type ('string', 'number', 'integer', 'boolean')

#### Returns this

The builder instance for method chaining




### addParameters

  * addParameters(  
parameters: {  
name: string;  
type: "string" | "number" | "boolean" | "integer";  
}[],  
): this

Adds multiple parameters to the subgraph at once.

#### Parameters

    * parameters: { name: string; type: "string" | "number" | "boolean" | "integer" }[]

Array of parameter configurations

#### Returns this

The builder instance for method chaining




### build

  * build(): [Subgraph](/interfaces/graph_dsl_graph_config_schema.Subgraph)

Builds and returns the final subgraph configuration.

#### Returns [Subgraph](/interfaces/graph_dsl_graph_config_schema.Subgraph)

The completed subgraph configuration

#### Throws

If the subgraph has no nodes




### setEndNode

  * setEndNode(node: string | [Node](/types/graph_dsl_graph_config_schema.Node) | [AbstractNode](./graph_dsl_nodes_builtin_abstract_node.AbstractNode)): this

Sets the end node of the subgraph (subgraphs can only have one end node).

#### Parameters

    * node: string | [Node](/types/graph_dsl_graph_config_schema.Node) | [AbstractNode](./graph_dsl_nodes_builtin_abstract_node.AbstractNode)

End node or node ID

#### Returns this

The builder instance for method chaining

Sets the start node of the subgraph (subgraphs can only have one start node).

Start node or node ID
